description:
This BoF will introduce you to the MariaDB project and Monty Program, the corporate stewards of the project. Your hosts will be Monty Program employees Michael “Monty” Widenius (CEO), Kurt von Finck (Chief Community and Communications Officer) and Colin Charles (Chief MariaDB Evangelist).

Come and learn what MariaDB is, how you can get involved and how MariaDB can work for you.

As is customary, black vodka will be served.
title: MariaDB: The Community Fork Of MySQL
